## FractNode class

Computes the fractional part

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class FractNode extends GenericMathNode 
```
**Extends:** [GenericMathNode](doc/markdown/./scene.genericmathnode.md)

## Remarks

Returns x - floor(x), the decimal part of x. Result is always in the range \[0, 1). Supports scalar and vector inputs (component-wise for vectors).
